text: Federal Route 115, or Jalan Pantai Cenang, is a major federal road in Langkawi Island, Kedah, Malaysia. ==Features== *One of the famous attractions is Pantai Cenang a long west coast town of Langkawi. It is dubbed as "Waikiki" of Malaysia. At most section, the Federal Route 115 was built under the JKR R5 road standard, allowing maximum speed limit of up to 90 km/h. == List of junctions and town == {|class="wikitable" |- !km||Exit||Junctions||To||Remarks |- | || ||Kuala Periang|| Jalan Teluk Burau West Teluk Burau Pantai Kok Teluk Datai Air Hangat East Padang Matsirat Kuah||T-junctions |- | || ||Sungai Ulu Melaka bridge|| || |- | || ||Langkawi Lagoon Resort|| || |- | || ||Perdana Beach Resort|| || |- | || ||Kampung Kuala Muda|| || |- | || ||Kompleks Kota Tani FAMA|| || |- | || ||Langkawi International College|| || |- | || ||Langkasuka Beach Resort|| || |- | || ||Jalan Lapangan Terbang Langkawi 2||Northeast Jalan Lapangan Terbang Langkawi 2 Padang Matsirat Kuah Langkawi International Airport Mahsuri International Exhibition Centre||T-junctions |- | || ||PULAPOL Langkawi|| || |- | || ||Landing light|| || |- | || ||MOFAZ Go-Kart Circuit|| || |- | || ||Jalan Bohor Tempoyak||East Jalan Bohor Tempoyak Bohor Tempoyak Kedawang Temoyong Bukit Malut Kuah||T-junctions |- | || ||Laman Padi (Rice Garden)||Laman Padi (Rice garden) || |- | || ||Pantai Cenang || || |- | || ||Pantai Cenang Kampung Cenang|| || |- | || ||Pantai Cenang Pelangi Beach Resort|| || |- | || ||Pantai Cenang Underwater World Langkawi||Underwater World Langkawi || |- | || ||Pantai Tengah||Northwest Jalan Pantai Tengah Kedawang Temoyong Bukit Malut Kuah||Dual T-junctions |- | || ||Pantai Tengah ||Pantai Tengah ||T-junctions |- | || ||Pantai Tengah|| || |- | || ||Holiday Villa Beach Resort|| || |- | || ||Rumah Peranginan Persekutuan Pulau Langkawi (Federal Villa) (Langkawi Federal Rest House)|| || |- | || ||Awana Porto Malai|| || |} ==References== Category:Malaysian Federal Roads
